title: playersql 2.2的配置文件如何使用&如何配置
author: hendyzone
txt_content:
plugin:
  debug: false
  delay: 10
  max-db-connection: 8
sync:
  health: true
  food: true
  exp: true
  inventory: true
  chest: true
  potion: true
dataSource:
  driver: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
  url: jdbc:mysql://localhost/db
  userName: root
  password: 123456|


上面的plugin 和 sync 都看得懂 唯独下面的dataSource 这段的意思不懂求教

replies.author: hendyzone
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 胡来的
replies.txt_content: url: jdbc:mysql://数据库地址/数据库名

replies.author: 梓
replies.txt_content:
dataSource下面的这些明显是MySQL的配置啊
这个插件必须要MySQL  不知道MySQL还是别用了

replies.author: hendyzone
replies.txt_content:
